result.eng: We should build on that goodwill.
result.ga: ba cheart tógáil ar an deathoil sin
result.orig: ba cheart tógáil ar an deathoil sin
result.html: ba cheart tógáil ar an deathoil sinWe should build on that goodwill.
result.ponchtml: ba ċeart tógáil ar an deaṫoil sinWe should build on that goodwill.

result.eng: They have a plan to build a new train line.
result.ga: tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáil
result.orig: tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáil
result.html: tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáilThey have a plan to build a new train line.
result.ponchtml: tá plean acu líne traenaċ nua a ṫógáilThey have a plan to build a new train line.

result.eng: In the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
result.ga: sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin
result.orig: sa gheimhreadh ba ghnách leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a dhéanamh sna srutháin

result.ponchtml: sa ġeiṁreaḋ ba ġnáċ leo ina mbeirt stopalláin a ḋéanaṁ sna sruṫáinIn the winter the two of them would build little dams in the streams.
